name: Mandelbrot Pictures29
short_description:
Pictures29 is a slight improvement on pictures27.
It now has a menu at the top, and random sound added. (A totally free program)
Pictures29 can create hundreds of interesting patterns which are roughly based on Mandelbrot.
Spirals, shiny films, spider webs, water drops, brains with holes, galaxies, etc.
By tapping on the C and V keys you can change the Mandelbrot Constant, and this changes the patterns gradually in either direction. Tapping on the  Page Up/Down keys trigger pre-set patterns.

Random sounds are a combination of sine waves with harmonics, following random numbers, a separate experiment which happened to run in the same program.
summary: It creates hundreds of pictures which are based on the Mandelbrot
